titleInfo.title: Adjoining roots of unity to E [infty] ring spectra in good cases: a remark
Homotopy invariant algebraic structures: a conference in honor of J. Michael Boardman, AMS Special Session on Homotopy Theory, January 7 - 10, 1998, Baltimore, M
